prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green and red colors that can fly quickly.
I want a Pokemon that has striking orange wings and stands out in a forest environment.
Generate a small insectoid creature with large eyes and unique color patterns for a new game.
Make a Pokemon that resembles Yanma but has added features like longer antennae and blue legs.
Imagine a flying Pokemon that combines elements of speed and agility with bright colors.
Design a bug and flying type Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and forests.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of exploration with colorful wings and an inquisitive nature.
